formdata.description:
(Required) Path to the document on your local file system.

Valid MIME types: `image/gif`, `image/jpg`, `image/jpeg`, `image/png`, `image/bmp`, `image/tiff`, `application/pdf`, `image/heic`.

functionality: Uploads a new Candidate Document.

api_name: Checkr.com API Docs: List existing Driver Licenses

api_name: Checkr.com API Docs: Delete an existing Employer
functionality: Deletes an existing Employer with the input `id`.

functionality: Returns an existing Employer with the input `candidate_id` or `employer_id`.

api_name: Checkr.com API Docs: Create a new Employer

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Checkr",
    "position": "Software Engineer",
    "contract_type": "full_time",
    "start_date": "2016-06-01",
    "address": {
        "street": "123 Main St.",
        "unit": "qR%jWljk",
        "city": "San Francisco",
        "state": "CA",
        "zipcode": "90401",
        "country": "US"
    },
    "id": "e44aa283528e6fde7d542194",
    "candidate_id": "xxx",
    "type": "employer",
    "salary": 10000,
    "do_not_contact": false,
    "end_date": "2017-05-01",
    "employer_url": "www.employer.com",
    "manager": {
        "name": "Joe Smith",
        "title": "Engineering Manager",
        "email": "joesmith@checkr.co",
        "phone": "212-555-1234"
    },
    "note": "Took time off to travel abroad."
}

        "website": "https://www.example.com"

    "oauth_authorize": false,
    "default_compliance_city": "San Francisco",
    "default_compliance_state": "CA"
}
